Text: Re Bandwidth Products On EnronOnline Revised Cc answers below in red formulated in close consultation with Jay Hawthorn and Leonardo Pacheco Cynthia Mark CT PM To Leonardo nron David nro n Dale CT Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communicati ons cc Jay HawthornEnron nron Communications Tom CT Rudi CT Jeff CT Ta na CT James NRON Subject Re Bandwidth Products On EnronOnline Revised The hardest part of preparing the Long Descriptions is making sure all of t he terms used in th GTCs that need to be defined elsewhere are covered Ill have to leave the final determination to the people who drafted the GTCs I also have to point out I dont know much of anything about how bandwidth is traded but here are the comments I was able to come up with to the Long Descriptions Bandwidth Units This concept has been difficult for me its not entirel y clear to me where the definition of this comes from is it the reference i n the box at the top of the relevant Annex You are correct If so maybe we should add a line something to the effect of Bandwidth Units shall mean DS for this Transaction Or better yet you might consider a generic referenc e to the relevant Annex that should apply which might let you delete the sentence referring to the quality as well We have changed the first senten ce of the long description to read A US Bandwidth Transaction with Enron Broadband Services LP EBS pursuant to which the Seller shall sell an d the Buyer shall buy the quantity of DS Bandwidth Units submitted by Counterparty via the Website Does DSO need to be defined somewhere DS is a term generally known in t he industry and is only used in the calculation of the Contract Price in the long description so we chose not to define it also the definition is incredibly long complex and technical If you feel strongly about it we can include it but since the long description tells you how many DSs you should include for calculation purposes we didnt think that it was necessary The way the different Price definitions fit together has also eluded me there is a formula in the Long Description and a different formula in the GTC The formula in the long description differs from the formula in the G TC and in the Master Agreement in order to accomodate the way that the price is being quoted on EnronOnline The quote represents the variable component of the Unit Price in the GTCs and the Master Agreement In order not to confuse people we decided to include the formula in both the long description and the confirmation so that customers could know that the Unit Price was calculated using the price quoted Unless industry trading convention is to the contrary the site makes more intuitive sense when the volume quoted and the price quoted use the same units If the volume is Bandwidth Units and the price is a per mile number some counterparties or perhaps more likely their lawyers may be confused The GTC contains the defined term Unit Price which is in Bandwidth Unit It seems to me tha t if we can quote the price as the Unit Price and the volume as Bandwidth Units we can ignore the number of DSOs per Bandwidth Unit and the number of DSO miles for the transaction Since they wont change from one product to the next the two sentences beginning with Any party entering into a Transaction could be moved to the GTC Since bandwidth is such a new product we really wanted to highlig ht to customers that if they intend to take physical delivery of bandwidth which is what we are offering they will need to establish connectivity wi th us This is already in the GTC but in an abundance of caution we wanted this fact highlighted especially since connectivity will entail further costs to the customer as well as signing documentation such as colocation agreements licenses etc this can be quite an involved process The term Contractual Currency is not used int he GTC Can the parenthetical reference come out The EnronOnline people may care about this more than I Agreed If the numbers of miles and DSOs need to stay in the Long Descriptions I would suggest that you change the references to make it DSOs per Bandwidth Unit both where the number is introduced and in the price formula and tha t the unt of measure against which the price is quoted be per DSO mile per month It is a quote for one DS mile of a Bandwidth Unit for a month Since the short description indicates the period for the contract being offered we felt like the quotation was pretty clear We are also a bit sensitive to using too many defined terms referring to each other in the lo ng description From a commercial perspective we are comfortable that the language used in the quote and the long description are clear and accurate Is the volume on the quotes page a monthly or total number This needs to be clear from the Long Description If a Customer wanted to buy of the OC Bandwidth Units quoted for the period from July July the Customer would be entitled to OCs for the period from July July I hope that this is responsive to your question we werent entirely clear So for example if you follow all of my suggestions you might end up with something like this A US Bandwidth Transaction with Enron Broadband Services LP EBS pursuant to which the Seller shall sell and the Buyer shall buy the quantit y of Bandwidth Units submitted by Counterparty via the Website The price shall be as submitted by the Counterparty via the Website Annex A of th e General Terms and Conditions shall apply to this Transaction The term of the Transaction shall begin at am EST on the Effectiv e Date and continue to pm EST on the Termination Date The Effective Date is Start Date and the Termination Date is Termination Date The Transaction shall be for Bandwidth between the New York Market Pooling Point th Avenue Suite New York NY NPANXX CLLI NYCMNYH and the Los Angeles Market Pooling Point W th Street Suite Los Angeles CA NPANXX CLLI LSAJCAWZH The price is quoted in US Dollars The unit of measure against which the price is quoted is one Bandwidth Unit per month and the quantity shown shall be in number of Bandwidth Units per month If quoting the price as a per Bandwidth Unit number doesnt work it would b e more like this A US Bandwidth Transaction with Enron Broadband Services LP EBS pursuant to which the Seller shall sell and the Buyer shall buy the quantit y of Bandwidth Units submitted by Counterparty via the Website The number of DSOs per Bandwidth Unit is The price shall be as submitted by the Counterparty via the Website Annex A of the General Terms and Condition s will apply to this Transaction The term of the Transaction shall begin at am EST on the Effectiv e Date and continue to pm EST on the Termination Date The Effective Date is Start Date and the Termination Date is Termination Date The Transaction shall be for Bandwidth between the New York Market Pooling Point th Avenue Suite New York NY NPANXX CLLI NYCMNYH and the Los Angeles Market Pooling Point W th Street Suite Los Angeles CA NPANXX CLLI LSAJCAWZH for a total of DSO miles The price is quoted in US Dollars The unit of measure against which the price is quoted is one DS mile per month and the quantity shown shall be in number of Bandwidth Units per mont h Therefore the Contract Price will be calculated as follows price x the number of DSs per Bandwidth Unit x the number of DS miles x the numbe r of Bandwidth Units Please let me know if you have any questions I will go ahead and approve the product in the system so you can proceed without me if necessary Mark Leonardo NRON PM To Tana CT James NRON Mark CT Taffy CT cc Subject Bandwidth Products On EnronOnline Revised FYI Forwarded by Leonardo PachecoCorpEnron on PM Leonardo Pacheco PM To Jay HawthornEnron nron Communications Tom CT Mark CT Rudi CT Jeff CT cc David nron Dale CT Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications Subject Bandwidth Products On EnronOnline Revised Please note that we have added another product type bringing the total number to three We have built three new Products Types called US Bandwidth DS Physical Forward US Bandwidth OC Physical Forward and US Bandwidth OCc Physical Forward Please go into DataManager and approve these Product Types look a t attached Document for long descriptions We are going life on the st of May If you need help with the approval process contact Dale Neuner ext or myself ext Please Do Not Reject the Product Type If yo u have questions or changes to the Product Type please contact me at your convenience Thank you very much for your cooperation Leonardo Pacheco ext

RE Termination of IP Transit AgreementI am thanks for more of it Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Monday December PM To Harkness Cynthia Subject FW Termination of IP Transit Agreement Are you riding herd over this happy stuff Original Message From TyrrellKnott Kim mailto Sent Monday December PM To Sarkissian Arshak Racicot Paul Lafuze Molly Mann Kay Cc Stefansky Jonathan Flanigon Jim Freedman Avi Subject Termination of IP Transit Agreement I am forwarding you a copy of Akamais termination of the IP Transit Agreement which has also been sent via Facsimile and Federal Express Please feel free to contact Jonathan Stefansky or Jim Flanigon if you wish to discuss this matter further Enron letterdoc Thank you Kim TyrrellKnott

RE Termination of IP Transit AgreementMe too Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Tuesday December AM To Harkness Cynthia Subject RE Termination of IP Transit Agreement Will work for food Original Message From Harkness Cynthia Sent Tuesday December AM To Mann Kay Subject RE Termination of IP Transit Agreement I am thanks for more of it Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Monday December PM To Harkness Cynthia Subject FW Termination of IP Transit Agreement Are you riding herd over this happy stuff Original Message From TyrrellKnott Kim mailto Sent Monday December PM To Sarkissian Arshak Racicot Paul Lafuze Molly Mann Kay Cc Stefansky Jonathan Flanigon Jim Freedman Avi Subject Termination of IP Transit Agreement I am forwarding you a copy of Akamais termination of the IP Transit Agreement which has also been sent via Facsimile and Federal Express Please feel free to contact Jonathan Stefansky or Jim Flanigon if you wish to discuss this matter further Enron letterdoc Thank you Kim TyrrellKnott

Short Form GTCs Cc Attached are the short form of GTCs that we would like to use in connection with our telecom transactions Certain provisions of these GTCs are bracketed and I would appreciate your view as to whether or not these provisions should be included Also please note that I have incorporated the termination provisions that you sent to me by fax and these provisions are bracketed and set forth in Section Let us have your feedback when you can as we would like to start using these and preparing a version for use with our advertising master Thanks in advance for your help Cynthia

FW Enron Files Cc Should we try and retrieve this information from Bowne Original Message From James Terrie Sent Thursday December PM To Harkness Cynthia Subject FW Enron Files Original Message From Spitzner Jean Sent Thursday December PM To James Terrie Subject Enron Files I have IR Board Meeting files from the last years If you need files to be printed in color or bw or electronic files let me know I will be here Please have a manager or you send this list of names to security to reactivate our badges we Bowne will be here for a while to take inventory and provide services to Enron Names Jean Spitzner Jason Alkire Sue Gaines Chris Glenn Thanks Spitz

Re Looking For A NannyI am about to be on nanny since July I havent had great luck and always have a livein I am presently going through Au Pair in America and I would be happy to have them send you info but they do live in and there is a pretty substantial agency fee My assistant Erica Braden also found an interesting website wwwnanniespluscom which seems to have a whole range of different types of nannies who work in different circumstances ie livein liveout housework no housework etc this also involves an agency and a smaller but not insignificant fee than au pair in America From time to time Alis school will have a posting for a nanny Ill forward it to you if I see such a listing Good luck may you fare better than I have Cynthia Carol St CT AM To Julia CT Leslie CT Elizabeth CT Mary CT Janet H CT Christi L CT Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications Kristina MordauntEnron nron Communications Ann NRON Shonnie CT Lisa CT cc Subject Looking For A Nanny I need to start thinking about hiring a nanny to take care of Charles our month old and Arthur our year old We are looking for someone that can come to our house during the week as we do not have room for a livein We live off of West about miles from downtown We would prefer someone that is legal and speaks English but wont rule out anyone else If you know of someone that might be interested please call or email me While I would prefer not to use an agency if you know of a good one please let me know Please pass this message on to anyone else at Enron that you think might be able to help Thanks Carol St Clair

Re Looking For A NannyI am about to be on nanny since July I havent had great luck and always have a livein I am presently going through Au Pair in America and I would be happy to have them send you info but they do live in and there is a pretty substantial agency fee My assistant Erica Braden also found an interesting website wwwnanniespluscom which seems to have a whole range of different types of nannies who work in different circumstances ie livein liveout housework no housework etc this also involves an agency and a smaller but not insignificant fee than au pair in America From time to time Alis school will have a posting for a nanny Ill forward it to you if I see such a listing Good luck may you fare better than I have Cynthia Carol St CT AM To Julia CT Leslie CT Elizabeth CT Mary CT Janet H CT Christi L CT Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications Kristina MordauntEnron nron Communications Ann NRON Shonnie CT Lisa CT cc Subject Looking For A Nanny I need to start thinking about hiring a nanny to take care of Charles our month old and Arthur our year old We are looking for someone that can come to our house during the week as we do not have room for a livein We live off of West about miles from downtown We would prefer someone that is legal and speaks English but wont rule out anyone else If you know of someone that might be interested please call or email me While I would prefer not to use an agency if you know of a good one please let me know Please pass this message on to anyone else at Enron that you think might be able to help Thanks Carol St Clair

Leona TanMark As per our discussion at the law conference and my voice mail to you earlier this week attached is Leona Tans resume Please let me know if I can assist you further in this regard All the best Cynthia

Re EnronOnline ETA Cc revised versions of the GTCs both a clean version and a version marked to show changes since last Fridays draft I will forward my comments in respect of the long definition tomorrow as I would like to make my comments after speaking with Jay Hawthorn Please do not hesitate to contact me should you have any questions or comments with regard to this document Please note that I havent yet heard anything from Dorn Hetzel in the event that I do I will revise and try and turn the document tomorrow afternoon Cynthia Leonardo NRON PM To Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications cc Subject EnronOnline ETA Attached please find ETA

Re Legal review of New Product for approval in EOL US Bandwidth DW Phy Fwd Cc I have finished my review of the EOL GTCs in light of the desks desire to offer DW online I will forward the revised GTCs to you shortly FYI we have revised the GTCs to contemplate DW and have also taken the opportunity to make a few cleanup edits that weve been holding until we had the opportunity to modify the GTCs I would prefer to continue to refer to the Pooling Points as Market Pooling Points as that is what is contemplated by the GTCs and it is consistent with our Master Bandwidth Purchase and Sale Agreement and other Master Bandwidth Documentation If there is an uproar about this I can revise the GTCs accordingly otherwise please use the Long Descriptions that Jeff Blumenthal prepared as he wrote them I have confirmed with the regulatory group that we dont have regulatory issues with this product as EOL is not available to the general public We have slightly revised the attachment below BQOS DW so that it comports with the GTCs it will be attached to the GTCs that I send you as Annex A Please call with any other questions or comments All the best Cynthia Robert B CT AM To Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications Mark CT cc Dale CT Melba CT Zal MasaniEnron nron Communications Subject Legal review of New Product for approval in EOL US Bandwidth DW Phy Fwd Cynthia I am a member of the EOL Product Control Documentation team requesting your review and advice regarding the setup of a new Product Type Bandwidth DW to be traded by Richard Schneider He has expressed great urgency in setting up this product quickly for trading online and your assistance is most appreciated The memo further below this email relates to the Product Type description for Bandwidth DW It is identical to those descriptions for Bandwidth DS OC and OCc which are currently online with the exception of that which is highlighted in red If it meets with your approval please advise Mark Taylor so that he may approve it in the EOL system Richard Schneider has forwarded a QoS attachment for DW to add to the GTCs Please advise if it meet with your approval If it does please provide us with the GTCs inclusive of the QoS for DW In addition there are paired city locations that need to be created in EOL for the existing product types and the DW Currently there is only one location description and it is for the New York Los Angeles paired cities It reads as follows The Transaction shall be for Bandwidth between the New York Market Pooling Point th Avenue Suite New York NY NPANXX CLLI NYCMNYH and the Los Angeles Market Pooling Point W th Street Suite Los Angeles CA NPANXX CLLI LSAJCAWZH for a total of DSO miles The paired cities utilize the same description parameters However Richard has requested that the location descriptions for the paired cities be revised by deleting Market and replacing it with Enron The following example references that change please advise if this meets with your approval The Transaction shall be for Bandwidth between the Seattle Enron Pooling Point th Ave Eleventh Floor Suite Seattle WA NPANXX CLLI STTLWAWBH and the Portland Enron Pooling Point NE Oregon St Suite Portland Oregon NPANXX CLLI PTLDORTIH for a total of DSO miles Please call me at extension as I am available to discuss this in person Thank you Rob Cass Forwarded by Robert B CassHOUECT on AM Robert B Cass AM To Mark CT Mark CT Jeff CT Stephen H CT cc Melba CT Dale CT Zal MasaniEnron nron Communications Subject New Product for approval in EOL US Bandwidth DW Phy Fwd Your review of the following product in the EOL Datamanager under Product Types Partially Approved is urgently needed Please do not reject the product if you request changes please call me at x and we will discuss The provision requiring your approval is stated as follows A US Bandwidth Transaction with Enron Broadband Services LP EBS pursuant to which the Seller shall sell and the Buyer shall buy the quantity of Bandwidth Units submitted by Counterparty via the Website The number of DSOs per DW is The price shall be as submitted by the Counterparty via the Website Any party entering into a Transaction to buy or sell Bandwidth Units from or to EBS shall be responsible for connecting to the Demarcation Point located at each Market Pooling Point in order to take physical delivery of such Bandwidth In order to achieve such connectivity a party may incur costs and expenses and may additionally be required to execute certain documentation Thanks Rob Cass Forwarded by Robert B CassHOUECT on AM Robert B Cass PM To Mark CT Tom CT Mark CT Jeff CT Bjorn CT Stephen H CT Rudi CT cc Dale CT Melba CT Subject New Product for approval in EOL Please note that the following new product type is awaiting your approval in the Enron Online Datamanager US Bandwidth DW Phy Fwd Please review at your earliest opportunity If you have any questions please contact me Rob Cass x x effective

EOL GTCs Cc my prior email attached are the EOL GTCs revised to reflect DW as a Bandwidth Unit available on EOL Please do not hesitate to contact me further should you require anything further with regard to this matter All the best Cynthia Forwarded by Cynthia HarknessEnron Communications on PM Marie Heard PM To Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications cc Subject EOL GTCs Here they are Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron Broadband Services Phone Fax Marie nronnet

Re SIGMA FACTOR NEEDED FOR NEW PRODUCT BANDWIDTH Cc Cc the revised EOL Bandwidth GTCs adding annexes for OCc and OCc Please do not hesitate to contact me should you require anything further in this regard All the best Cynthia Harkness Robert B CT AM To Matthew NRON cc Mark CT Tom CT Mark CT Jeff CT Bjorn CT Stephen H CT Rudi CT Frank L CT Richard SchneiderEnron nron Communications Cynthia HarknessEnron nron Communications Torrey CT Tara CT Stephanie CT Subject SIGMA FACTOR NEEDED FOR NEW PRODUCT BANDWIDTH Cc Hi Matt SIGMA FACTOR REQUEST Commercial has requested that the following new product for Bandwidth be setup for trade in EOL Please note that it has the same setup format as the existing active EOL Bandwidth products Commodity OCc Currency USD Default UOM DSO Miles Country USA Description A US Bandwidth Transaction with Enron Broadband Services LP EBS pursuant to which the Seller shall sell and the Buyer shall buy the quantity of Bandwidth Units submitted by Counterparty via the Website The number of DSOs per OCc is The price shall be as submitted by the Counterparty via the Website Any party entering into a Transaction to buy or sell Bandwidth Units from or to EBS shall be responsible for connecting to the Demarcation Point located at each Market Pooling Point in order to take physical delivery of such Bandwidth In order to achieve such connectivity a party may incur costs and expenses and may additionally be required to execute certain documentation ATTENTION CYNTHIA HARKNESS Please note that a revised GTC add annex A for OCC is requested from Legal so that this product may be set up in EOL THANKS ATTENTION ALL OTHER PARTIES TO THIS DISTRIBUTION Please note that this email is your advance notice of a new product being setup in EOL Thanks Rob Cass x

First Advertising Option Cc find applicable documents to be sent to KTBU TV in respect of a call option that they have agreed to sell to us Please do not hesitate to contact Erik Simpson or me should you wish to discuss

First Advertising Option Cc find applicable documents to be sent to KTBU TV in respect of a call option that they have agreed to sell to us Please do not hesitate to contact Erik Simpson or me should you wish to discuss
